content: अभिनी {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bring near, conduct or lead towards, carry to; तटाभिनीतेनांभसा <ls>Ki. 8. 32</ls>; अमात्यस्य गृहजनं स्वगृहमभिनीय रक्षसि <ls>Mu. 1</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">5</ls>; <ls n="Mu.">6. 15</ls>; दृष्ट्वा शरं ज्यामभिनीयमानं <ls>Mb.</ls> being fitted to the bow. {@--2@} To act, represent or exhibit dramatically, gesticulate; mostly occurring in stagedirections; श्रुतिमभिनीय <ls>Ś. 3</ls> acting as if he heard something; <ls>Mu. 1. 2</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">3. 31</ls>, <ls>M. 2. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To quote, adduce, introduce. {@--4@} To allow to elapse.
